long_description: The REI Travel Document Organizer provides ample space to keep essential travel documents secure and accessible. Clutch-style design provides easy access and good security. Interior organizer pockets manage travel documents, tickets, currency, passport, cards and coins. Panel opening zipper offers easy access to contents and zip design provides secure closure. Exterior zip pocket stores small items. Low-profile handle provides convenience and secure grasp. REI Travel Document Organizer stows very compactly for easy packing inside travel bag and luggage.
short_description: The REI Travel Document Organizer provides ample space to keep essential travel documents secure and accessible. Clutch-style design provides easy access and good security.
